about.description: Dedicated and skilled software engineer with over a decade of experience in web development and technical support. Proficient in a wide range of programming languages and tools, with a proven track record of contributing to team success through hard work, attention to detail, and excellent organizational skills. Currently focusing on AWS cloud technologies and automation tooling to improve customer experiences and team efficiency.

awsSupport.title: AWS Support Tools Enhancement
awsSupport.description: Delivered 21 incremental enhancements for EC2 Instance Connect Console, focusing on case prevention and reducing failed connections.

automationTraining.title: Automation Training Leadership
automationTraining.description: Led and organized automation training bootcamps, training engineers and improving assessment pass rates to >70%.

toolingAutomation.title: Tooling & Automation Expertise
toolingAutomation.description: Mentored 9 new automation specialists in 2024, contributing to AWS Support's automation and tooling community growth.

securityLeadership.title: Security Leadership
securityLeadership.description: First security specialist for the support team, improving security across the organization through tool development.

highlights: Provide technical support and guidance on AWS services to customers
Develop internal tools to improve team efficiency and customer service quality
Create training materials and videos for new employees and customers
Collaborate on console improvements and bug fixes, enhancing user experience
Developed and maintained a matching service platform for new graduates and hiring companies
Redesigned database architecture to improve search performance by tenfold
Led development projects for clients ranging from SMEs to large corporations
Created a custom CMS for a major beverage company's internal communication system

education.university: Kansai Gaidai University, Faculty of Foreign Studies
education.degree: Bachelor of Arts in English and American Studies
